original: tatkasmādaprastutasyaiva pratyakṣasya cagamasya copakṣepaḥ kṛta iti cet |

nanu idam uktam sat vyavahāra asat vyahārayoḥ anyonya vyavaccheda sthita lakṣaṇa tve na eka abhāvasya apara bhāva nāntarīyaka tvāt viprakṛṣṭe tad nimitta abhāvāt

original: tathāhi parokṣe'rthe sadvyavahāranivṛttiḥ kathantannimittābhāvepi dvayorapyanayoranupalabdhyoḥ svaviparyayahetvabhāvabhāvābhyāṃ sadvyavahārapratiṣedhaphalatvantulyamekatra  #

saṃśayāt aparatra viparyayāt iti vacanāt saṃśayena iti ced
yadi evam katham tarhi asat vyavahāra niścayaḥ tatra yuktim anupatati

original: yatra tu niścayena sadvyavahāranivṛttistatrāsasadvyavahāropi yukta evānyaḥ pravartanaphalosītyukteḥ na cābhāvarūpavyavacchede bhāvānuṣaṅgosti  #
analyzed: yatra tu niścayena sat vyavahāra nivṛttiḥ tatra asasat vyavahāraḥ api yuktaḥ eva anyaḥ pravartana phalaḥ asi iti ukteḥ na ca abhāva rūpa vyavacchede bhāva anuṣaṅgaḥ asti
niyamena

original: nahi bandhyātanayanabhaḥpaṅkajādiṣvasadavasthatā bhavati pratiṣedhāt sadavasthatā bhavati pratiṣedhamātrantu syāt |
analyzed: nahi bandhyā tanaya nabhaḥ paṅkaja ādiṣu asat avasthatā bhavati pratiṣedhāt sat avasthatā bhavati pratiṣedha mātram tu syāt
tayoḥ anyonya vyavacchedena avasthānāt
tathā atra api apratyakṣe sat vyavahāra pratiṣedhāt na vidhi bhūtā sat vyavahāra anusa
ṣaṅgaḥ tad vyavaccheda mātram tu syāt

syāt ityādinā iti āstāntā vat

original: adhunā sāmānyabhūtānāṃ buddhivyapadeśānāṃ sadvyavahārahetutvamapi nāstīti kathayannāha |

original: te sarvve buddhivyapedeśā na vastusattāṃ sādhayanti |

kutas etat iti āha

ādi śabdena vyoma utpala ādayaḥ parigṛhyante

kathaṃcid ta drūpaḥ anubhava āhita vāsanā paripāka prabhāvāt iti arthaḥ

original: śaṅkhacakravartītyādinā prakāreṇa tadanena vastusattāṃ sādhayantītyetasya kāraṇamāha |
analyzed: śaṅkha cakravarti ityādinā prakāreṇa tat anena vastu sattām sādhayanti iti etasya kāraṇam āha
nānā ekām artha kriyām kartum śīlam yeṣām te tathā uktāḥ
teṣu api ca vṛtteḥ kāraṇāt
kimartham teṣu taṣām vṛttiḥ tad bhāva khyāpanāya
teṣām nānā eka artha kriyā kāriṇām bhāvaḥ tasya khyāpanāya
nānā artha kriyākāri tvasya ekārtha kriyākāri tvasya ca kathana artham iti yāvat
asti eva tarhi tasya vastunaḥ ta tvam iti atas āha
nānā eka ātma tāyāḥ abhāve pi tasya vastunaḥ iti adhā

original: nānaikarūpāṇāmbuddhivyapadeśānāṃ tadanena na vastubhedābhedau sādhayantīti sādhayati |

rājā mahāsammataḥ idam atīta vṛtteḥ udāharaṇam

śaṅkha cakravarti ityādi anutpanna vṛtteḥ śabdaiḥ viṣāṇam ityādi yadā upāttasya rūpam sa nidarśanam cakṣuḥ vijñāna janaka tvāt
sa pratighaḥ ca sva deśe para utpatti pratibandhāt
etat nānā artha kriyā kāriṣu vṛtteḥ iti etasya nidarśanam
yasmāt tat cakṣuḥ vijñāna ādi kārya janaka tvāt eka rūpam api nānā rūpaiḥ sa nidarśana ādi śabdaiḥ viṣayīkriyate

anyathā bhinna adhikaraṇa tvāt vakula utpala kamala mālatī mallikā ādi śabdānām eva sāmānādhikaraṇyam eva na bhavet iti bhāvaḥ

original: vaśā]darthatatvaṃ vyavatiṣṭhata iti tada vasthaṃ sandigdhavipakṣavyatirekatvaṃ hetoriti |

yaḥ ca iti pratijānīmahe na vyapadiśyamāna tvāt
śilā tulā āḍhaka prasevikā vat iti

asmākam tu tad abhāva pramāṇa sādhakam pramāṇam etat
ye paraspara vyāvarttamāna svabhāva avasthiti samāliṅgita śarīrāḥ te vyatirikta avayavi dravya anugata mūrttim ātma atiśayam na ātma śāt kurvanti

original: parasparavyāvarttamānānāmapi yadyekasvabhāvānabhyupagame tasya teṣu sarvvātmanā'nyathā vā vṛttyayogo bādhakampramāṇaṃ |
analyzed: paraspara vyāvarttamānānām api yadi eka svabhāva anabhyupagame tasya teṣu sarvva ātmanā anyathā vā vṛtti ayogaḥ bādhakam pramāṇam
kutas tat hi yugapad anekatra sarvva ātmanā vartamānam aneka ādhāra sthita ādheya vat aneka ttvam ātmanaḥ anumāpayati iti katham asya abhinna svabhāva tā yojyate
eka avayava upalambha velāyām ca sakalasya tatra parisamāpta tvāt upalabdhiḥ pasaṅgaḥ
aneka avayava upalabdhi dvāreṇa upalambha katipaya avayava darśane api syāt samasta avayava upalambha dvāreṇa upalabdhau sarvvakālam adarśana prasaṅgaḥ
tasya ambhāsvara madhya bhāgānām sakṛt anupalambhāt
eka avayava kampe ca sarvva kampa ādi prasaṅgaḥ ca vācyaḥ
na api eka deśena sāvayavatva prasaṅgāt
eka deśānām ca anavasthā prasaṅgāt

original: tepi hi tasyāvayavā iti pāṇyavayavavṛtteṣvapi anyena varttitavyamityādinā tadanyaikadeśābhāvavānekaḥ kaścidavayavī vidyate |

original: yasmāt sarvvapramāṇanivṛttirnnāsadvyavahārahetustasmāt sa svabhāvaviśeṣastrividhaviprakarṣāviprakṛṣṭarūpo bhāvo yataḥ pramāṇātsaṃnihita samastatadanyatkriyādikāraṇāt  #
analyzed: yasmāt sarvva pramāṇa nivṛttiḥ na asat vyavahāra hetuḥ tasmāt sa svabhāva viśeṣaḥ trividha viprakarṣa aviprakṛṣṭa rūpaḥ bhāvaḥ yatas pramāṇāt saṃnihita samasta tad anya kriyā ādi kāraṇāt

original: tasyaiva yathoktasya pramāṇasya nivṛttistasya svabhāvaviśeṣasyāsadvyavahāraṃ prasādhayati |

original: avadhāraṇamanumānāvagamādinivṛttervyavacchedāya kiṅkāraṇantasya svabhāvaviśeṣasya svabhāvasattāyāstatsya yathoktasya pramānasya yeyaṃ sattā  #

original: tathāhi yatra sa tādṛgvidhaḥ padārthastatrāvaśyaṃ tenāpi pramāṇena bhavitavyaṃ |

vidyamānaḥ api avyabhicāraḥ pramāṇena apratipādita tvāt asatkalpaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
tat etat na apradarśita avinābhāva sambaddhāt hetoḥ sādhya niścayaḥ
tat tasmāt na pratijñāyāḥ dṛṣṭānta virodhaḥ upi hetvābhāsān ativartate
asya api tadānīm saṃdigdha vipakṣa vyāvṛttika tvāt iti āgūritam
na kevala heu virodhaḥ iti api śabdaḥ
ubhayathā api hetu dvāreṇa dṛṣṭānta dvāreṇa ca

original: na hetudvāreṇa prāgdṛṣṭāntadoṣān prasaṅgena parājitasya vādino doṣāntarasya dṛṣṭāntavirodhasya vācyasya vānapekṣaṇāt parājitaparājayābhāvādityākūtaṃ
analyzed: na hetu dvāreṇa prāk dṛṣṭānta doṣān prasaṅgena parājitasya vādinaḥ doṣa antarasya dṛṣṭānta virodhasya vācyasya vā anapekṣaṇāt parājita parājaya abhāvāt iti ākūtam

original: viśeṣeṇa sādhanāvayavānukramavādino naiyāyikasya sa hi pratijñāhetūdāharaṇopanayanigamanānāmānupūrvīṃ pratipannaḥ |
analyzed: viśeṣeṇa sādhana avayava anukrama vādinaḥ naiyāyikasya sa hi pratijñā hetu udāharaṇa upanaya nigamanānām ānupūrvīm pratipannaḥ

udāharaṇa sādharmyam ityādi
aṅgīkṛtya ca idam avādina tu dṛṣṭānta virodhaḥ hetvābhāsa rūpa asaṃsparśī asti
yathā uktam anantaram iti
etena vikalpataḥ doṣa vidhānam prayuktam
evam tāvat vyavasthitam etat yathā pratijñāyāḥ dṛṣṭānta virodhaḥ hetvābhāsāt na ativartate iti
yat punar udāhṛtam aviddha karaṇena vyaktam eka prakṛtikam parimita tvāt carāva ādi vat iti

original: tatrāpi viruddho hetuḥ parimitattvasya hetoḥ sapakṣe'bhāve vā vṛtteḥ |
analyzed: tatra api viruddhaḥ hetuḥ parimita ttvasya hetoḥ sapakṣa ibhāve vā vṛtteḥ
vipakṣe ca aneka prakṛtike śarāva ādau vṛtteḥ

original: saṃprati hetorapi dṛṣṭāntena virodho hetvābhāsāntargata iti kathayati |
analyzed: saṃprati hetoḥ api dṛṣṭāntena virodhaḥ hetvābhāsa antargataḥ iti kathayati

raṇa tvam ubhayatra avṛtteḥ
viruddha tvam vā
kadā viruddha ttvam iti āha

original: vaidharmye yadi syādapyatrodāharaṇamuktaṃ tenaiva guṇavyatiriktaṃ dravyamarthāntaratvenānupalabhyamānatvād ghaṭavaditi atrāpi dṛśyatve satīti  #
analyzed: vaidharmye yadi syāt api atra udāharaṇam uktam tena eva guṇa vyatiriktam dravyam artha antara tvena anupalabhyamāna tvāt ghaṭa vat iti atra api dṛśya tve sati iti
hetu viśeṣaṇe viruddhaḥ sapakṣe avartamāna tvāt
vipakṣe ca rūpa ādīnām svarūpe vartamāna tvāt
viśeṣaṇa anupādāne tu anupalabdhānām api piśāca ādīnām paraspara vyatireki tvāt

original: na cātra ghaṭavaditi dṛṣṭānto yuktastasyaiva dravyāntaratvena pakṣīkṛtatvāt |
analyzed: na ca atra ghaṭa vat iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ yuktaḥ tasya eva dravya antara tvena pakṣīkṛta tvāt

original: tasya rūpādibhyo bhedena grahaṇaṃ pūrvvameva pratisi[?
analyzed: tasya rūpa ādibhyaḥ bhedena grahaṇam pūrvvam eva

original: ṣi]ddhaṃ grahaṇe cāsiddho hetvābhāsa ityasmanmatameva sthitaṃ |
analyzed: grahaṇe ca asiddhaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ iti asmad matam eva sthitam

original: atha hetoḥ pramāṇavirodhe ko hetvābhāsa ityāha |
analyzed: atha hetoḥ pramāṇa virodhe kaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ iti āha
asiddha ugneḥ śaityasya a vidyamāna tvāt

nahi pratyakṣam dravyam hetum bādhate
tasya dharmiṇi siddha tvāt
kintu pratijñā artham anuṣṇa tvam

original: atha pratijñārthasya pratyakṣeṇa bādhitatvāddhetostena vyāptirnnāstīti hetoḥ pramāṇavirodha ucyate |
analyzed: atha pratijñā arthasya pratyakṣeṇa bādhita tvāt hetoḥ tena vyāptiḥ na asti iti hetoḥ pramāṇa virodhaḥ ucyate

original: evantarhi viruddhena sādhyadharmeṇāvyāpteḥ sandigdhavyatireko hetvābhāsa ityasmatpakṣa eva samarthitaḥ |
analyzed: evam tarhi viruddhena sādhya dharmeṇa avyāpteḥ sandigdha vyatirekaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ iti asmad pakṣaḥ eva samarthitaḥ

tat uktam
pratyākṣa ādi vi
rodhāḥ ye vyāpta kāla upapātinaḥ

original: te sarve na viruddhena vyāptidharmeṇa yuñjata iti ||

original: pratijñāyāḥ pramāṇavirodhaḥ svavacanavirodhena vyākhyātaḥ kṛtapratikriyastatredameva nigrahādhikaraṇamasādhanāṅgabhūtāyāḥ pratijñāyāḥ sādhanavākye  #

prayogaḥ ityādinā
iti tasmāt sarvve eva iti upasaṃharati
yat tu viruddham uttaram iti pūrvvapakṣa uktam aparam upakṣipati tat asambaddham eva

original: anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvād ghaṭavadityekaṃ bauddhenanyena vā kṛte mīmāṃsakaḥ kāṇādonyo vā svapakṣasiddhena gotvādinā sāmānyena parasya sādhanavādino  #
analyzed: anityaḥ śabdaḥ aindriyaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti ekam bauddhena anyena vā kṛte mīmāṃsakaḥ kāṇādaḥ anyaḥ vā sva pakṣa siddhena go tva ādinā sāmānyena parasya sādhana vādinaḥ

original: bauddhasya hetorvyabhicārasiddhimākāṃkṣeta gotvamapyaindriyakaṃ tadapi bhavato'nityaṃ prasajyata ityeva yadi paraṃ pratyevādhyāropyābhidadhyād  #
analyzed: bauddhasya hetoḥ vyabhicāra siddhim ākāṃkṣeta go tvam api aindriyakam tat api bhavataḥ nityam prasajyate iti eva yadi param prati eva adhyāropya abhidadhyāt

original: vyabhicāraṃ tadā tasya bauddhasya tatsāmānyamaindriyakaṃ nityañca svapakṣaviruddhaṃ nityapadārthānabhyupagāmānnābhimatamataśca kathaṃ vyabhicāra  #
analyzed: vyabhicāram tadā tasya bauddhasya tat sāmānyam aindriyakam nityam ca sva pakṣa viruddham nitya padārtha anabhyupagāmāt na abhimatam atas ca katham vyabhicāra

original: iti virodho vyahatirayuktattvamiti yāvat yujyata uttarasyetyadhyāhartavyaṃ |
analyzed: iti virodhaḥ vyahatiḥ ayukta ttvam iti yāvat yujyate uttarasya iti adhyāhartavyam

original: na tu punarevamasau parasyevopari bhāramupakṣipya vyabhicāramudbhāvayati tatkathamuttarasya virodhaḥ yataḥ sa hyuttaravādī svayaṃ pratipanne  #
analyzed: na tu punar evam asau parasya iva upari bhāram upakṣipya vyabhicāram udbhāvayati tat katham uttarasya virodhaḥ yatas sa hi uttaravādī svayam pratipanne

original: nityatvena gotve hetoraindriyakatvasya vṛtteḥ saṃśayānaḥ san kiṅghaṭavadaindriyakatvādanityaḥ śabdo bhavatu gotvādivannitya ityapratipattimaniścayamātmanastathā  #
analyzed: nitya tvena go tve hetoḥ aindriyaka tvasya vṛtteḥ saṃśayānaḥ san kiṅghaṭa vat aindriyaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ bhavatu go tva ādi vat nityaḥ iti apratipattim aniścayam ātmanaḥ tathā

original: bruvāṇaḥ khyāpayati satpakṣe khalvendriyakamapi gotvaṃ nityaṃ tasmādayaṃ sāṃpratyanaikāntika itītthamātmīyamevābhyupagamaṃ puraskṛtyānekāntañcodayati
analyzed: bruvāṇaḥ khyāpayati sat pakṣe khalu endriyakam api go tvam nityam tasmāt ayam sāṃprati anaikāntikaḥ iti ittham ātmīyam eva abhyupagamam puraskṛtya anekāntam codayati
tatas sādhu iva uttaram iti samudāya arthaḥ

original: syāt matambauddhasya nāstyevagotvaṃ nityaṃ tato vyāhatamevottaramityata āhu |
analyzed: syāt matam bauddhasya na asti eva go tvam nityam tatas vyāhatam eva uttaram iti atas āhu

original: sa ca heturaindriyakatvāditi satyasati vā gotve paramārthataḥ |
analyzed: sa ca hetuḥ aindriyaka tvāt iti sati asati vā go tve paramārthataḥ

original: aprasādhtasādhanasāmarthyaḥ san viparyaye bādhakapramāṇāvṛtyā saṃśayahetutvādanaikāntika eva |

original: aprasādhitaṃ sādhanāya sāmarthyaṃ sādhyā vinābhāvitvalakṣanamasyeti vigrahaḥ |
analyzed: a prasādhitam sādhanāya sāmarthyam sādhya a vinābhāvi tva lakṣanam asya iti vigrahaḥ
sādhana śabdaḥ bhāva sādhanaḥ

original: yadā tu bādhakapramānabalena hetoravinābhāvaṃ sarvvopasaṃhāreṇa sādhayati yatkiñcidindriyajñānagrāhyaṃ svanirbhāsajñānajanakatvāttatra sarvvamanityaṃ  #
analyzed: yadā tu bādhaka pramāna balena hetoḥ avinābhāvam sarvva upasaṃhāreṇa sādhayati yat kiñcid indriya jñāna grāhyam sva nirbhāsa jñāna janaka tvāt tatra sarvvam anityam

original: nityatve sarvvadā tadviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ prasañjate na vā kadācidapi tathāhi |
analyzed: nitya tve sarvvadā tad viṣayam jñānam prasañjate na vā kadācid api tathā hi
sva ātmani jñāna janane yat śaktam śaktam eva tat
athavā aśaktam kadācid ced aśaktam sarvadā eva tat
tasya śaktiḥ aśaktiḥ vā yā svabhāvena saṃsthitā
nitya tvāt acikitsyasya kaḥ tām kṣapayitum kṣamaḥ iti

original: tadānīṃ gotvādīnāmapi nityānāmekapraghaṭena iva pāṭitatvāt gotve hetoravṛtterna saṃśaya eva bhavati |

etena ityādi su jñānam
tatra api anaikāntika hetvābhāsa tva anativṛttiḥ iti saṃkṣepaḥ
tad saṃśaya hetutva mukhena anaikāntika tvam asamarthite sati hetau
anyatra api iti eka pakṣa pratipanne api vastuni tulyam iti na ubhaya siddha itarayoḥ vastunoḥ anaikāntika tva viśeṣaḥ
yathā kathitam anantaram eva
sa ca hetuḥ sati asati vā ityādinā
itarat eka pakṣa apratipannam anaikāntika viṣa tvāt ca anaikāntikam iti vyākhyātam
syāt cittam na aniṣṭeḥ dūṣaṇam sarvva prasiddhaḥ tu dvayoḥ api sādhanam
dūṣaṇam vā iti etat katham evan na vyāhanyate iti tat ca na evam
niścita dūṣaṇa abhisandhi vacanāt

original: tata eva tadantaramāhānyaḥ punaḥ sādhyatvamīkṣata iti |
analyzed: tatas eva tad antaram āha anyaḥ punar sādhya tvam īkṣate iti
etat tu syāt

original: yadapyuktamudyota kareṇa pratijñāvirodhasūtrameva vivṛṇvatā dṛṣṭāntābhāsā ityādi tadapyavayavāntaravādino naiyāyikasyāyuktaṃ |
analyzed: yat api uktam udyota kareṇa pratijñāvirodha sūtram eva vivṛṇvatā dṛṣṭānta ābhāsāḥ ityādi tat api avayava antara vādinaḥ naiyāyikasya ayuktam
bauddhaḥ eva evam bruvāṇaḥ śobhate iti abhipretam

original: ) tadvacanena hetvābhasavacanena gamyamānasya dṛṣṭāntābhāsasya tasmāddhetoḥ sakāśāt sādhanāntaratvābhāvaprasaṅgāt |

nanu ca dṛṣṭānta ābhāsānām hetvābhāseṣu antarbhāve

original: tidiṣṭe hetordṛṣṭānte'vayavāntaraṃ na prāpnotīti vacanamasambaddhamevetyata āha |
analyzed: tidiṣṭe hetoḥ dṛṣṭānta ivayava antaram na prāpnoti iti vacanam asambaddham eva iti atas āha

ayam asya prayogaḥ manasi vijṛmbhate

original: yadyato'rthāntarabhūtaṃ na tadābhāsavacanena tadābhāsavacanaṃ nyāyyaṃ na ca tadābhāseṣu tadābhāsānāmantarbhāvaḥ |
analyzed: yat yatas ṛtha antara bhūtam na tad ābhāsa vacanena tad ābhāsa vacanam nyāyyam na ca tad ābhāseṣu tad ābhāsānām antarbhāvaḥ
tat yathā pratyakṣa ābhāsānām anumāna ābhāseṣu

original: tathā ca bhavato hetordṛṣṭāntorthāntarabhūta iti vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhiḥ ato'vaśyaṃ dṛṣṭāntasya hetāvantarbhāva eṣṭavyaḥ |
analyzed: tathā ca bhavataḥ hetoḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ ṛtha antara bhūtaḥ iti vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhiḥ atas vaśyam dṛṣṭāntasya hetau antarbhāvaḥ eṣṭavyaḥ

original: tatra ca na dṛṣṭāntaḥ pṛthak sādhanāvayavaḥ syāt |
analyzed: tatra ca na dṛṣṭāntaḥ pṛthak sādhana avayavaḥ syāt
apṛthak vatteḥ eka vyāpāra ttvāt iti arthaḥ
etat eva vyācaṣṭe yaḥ dṛṣṭānte ityādinā

original: evaṃ pratijñāhetvorvirodhasya prapañcasya hetvābhāsaiḥ saṅgṛhītatvānna pṛthagvacanaṃ karttavyamityabhidhāyādhanā pratighahānyādīnāmapīyameva  #

ṣu antarbhāve iti

original: kutaḥ asamarthasya nyāyabalena sādhyapratipādane vādina iti śeṣaḥ |
analyzed: kutas asamarthasya nyāya balena sādhya pratipādane vādinaḥ iti śeṣaḥ

original: uttaraḥ paścād phalabhāvī sa cāsau pratijñāsanyāsaśca tasyāpekṣayā kinna kiñcidityarthaḥ |
analyzed: uttaraḥ paścāt phala bhāvī sa ca asau pratijñā sanyāsaḥ ca tasya apekṣayā kin na kiñcid iti arthaḥ

original: aśaktaḥ paricchedaḥ saṃkhye yeṣāṃ klīvapralāpaceṣṭitānāṃ tāni tathā klīvādīnāṃ pralāpā yeṣāṃ vādinānteṣāṃ ceṣṭitāni pratijñāsaṃnyāsādīni vaikimupanyatastaiḥ

kaḥ punar evam sati doṣaḥ iti āha
evam hi a tri prasaṅgaḥ syāt
evamādi api iti mūrcchā vepathu trasattva ādīnām ādi śabdena avarodhaḥ

original: tasmādetadapyasambaddhaṃ vidvatsadasyevaṃ prakārasya sthūlatvādittyābhiprāyaḥ tadatra bhāvivitkaḥ svayamāśaṃkya kila pratividhatte sthūlatvenedaṃ  #
analyzed: tasmāt etat api asambaddham vidvas sadasi ivam prakārasya sthūla tvāt iti yā abhiprāyaḥ tat atra bhāvivitkaḥ svayam āśaṃkya kila pratividhatte sthūla tvena idam
nigrahasthānam iti ced
prāśnika prativādi sannidhau pratijñāta artha apahnavaṅkaroti iti
asambaddham ucyate tat na abhiprāya aparijñāt

original: na brūmo dhvaṃsī śabda iti kintu saṃyogavibhāgābhyāṃ na vyakta ityayaṃ pratijñātārtha ityāha sāmānyasya ca svāśrayavyaṅgyatvāt vivādābhāva
analyzed: na brūmaḥ dhvaṃsī śabdaḥ iti kintu saṃyoga vibhāgābhyām na vyaktaḥ iti ayam pratijñāta arthaḥ iti āha sāmānyasya ca sva āśraya vyaṅgya tvāt vivāda abhāva
nigrahasthānam tu pūrvam apratijñāta artha tvāt

original: anaikāntikadoṣeṇa pratiṣedhe hetau pratijñātārthāpahnavaṅkarotīti nigṛhyata iti tatravācyaṃ yadi vādī sākāṃkṣa evāntarāle kenacid durvvidagdhenānaikāntikadoṣeṇa  #
analyzed: anaikāntika doṣeṇa pratiṣedhe hetau pratijñāta artha apahnavaṅkaroti iti nigṛhyate iti tatra vācyam yadi vādī sa ākāṃkṣaḥ eva antarāle kenacid durvvidagdhena anaikāntika doṣeṇa
coditaḥ san pratijñāta artha phalīkaraṇena sva ābhā prāyam āviṣkaroti
tadā anyaḥ api na kaścid doṣaḥ
kim aṅga punar pratijñā saṃnyāsaḥ

original: atha nirākāṃkṣaḥ san paścāccoditaḥ pratijñāṃ viśinaṣṭi |
analyzed: atha nirākāṃkṣaḥ san paścāt coditaḥ pratijñām viśinaṣṭi

original: tadapyanaikāntikadoṣeṇaiva nigṛhyata iti kimuttarapratijñāsaṃnyāsāpekṣayeti na kiñcitparihṛtaṃ kiñca sphuṭamidaṃ pratijñāntarentarbhavatīti  #
analyzed: tat api anaikāntika doṣeṇa eva nigṛhyate iti kim uttara pratijñā saṃnyāsa apekṣayā iti na kiñcid parihṛtam kiñca sphuṭam idam pratijñāntare ntarbhavati iti
naḥ pṛthak vācyam iti
aviśeṣa ukte hetau ityādi sūtram atra nidarśanam udāharaṇam iti arthaḥ
kāpilaḥ pramāṇayati pradhāna siddhi pratyāśayā
eka prakṛti idam vyaktam vyakta ādi parimita tvāt ghaṭa śarāva ādi vat iti

original: padavinyāsaḥ kārya iti tasmātsarvvānukramabhāṣaṇamparājayādhikaraṇaṃ vācyaṃ atredānīmākṣapādaḥ sarvvamidaṃ dūṣaṇamanabhyupagamenaiva pūrvvapakṣasyāsmābhiḥ  #

original: anye punarvivaraṇerthagrahaṇaṃ paśyantaḥ sūtrepyarthagrahaṇaṃ bhrāntyā paṭhanti |

original: vijñātārthaṃ sādhanavākyaṃ pariṣadā tasya prativādinā yadavijñātamanavabodhastadajñānamityevaṃ bhāvapakṣe'kṣaravinyāsaḥ |

original: karmapakṣe tu tasyeti nādhyāhartavyamekavākyatayaiva tu vyākhyātaṃ |

original: vijñātaṃ parṣadeti kimarthaṃ parṣadāpyavijñāte vādina evāvijñātārtha nigrahasthānaṃ bhavatīti jñāpanāya |

original: arthe khalvavijñāte prativādī na tasya pratiṣedhaṃ brūyāditi |

original: apare tūttareṇa dūṣaṇagranthena sahaitat sambadhnanti taccāyuktaṃ bhāṣyavārtikagranthatvādasya |

nyāyyam api tu anyeṣām api iti āha
api ca ityādi

original: nahi kaściddhyanyassādhanavādī pratipakṣadharmamabhyunujānāti pratijñāmvā pratijñāsādhanāyopādatta ityādi vācyaṃ |

tadā na kañcid

atas vyarthaḥ prapañcaḥ mahā muninā akriyata

original: parapakṣapratiṣedhe kartavye uttaraṃ dūṣaṇaṃ yadā na pratipadyate na vetti nābhidadhāti tadā nigṛhīto veditavya itīyān paragranthaḥ |

ataeva asmābhiḥ api idam adoṣa udbhāvanam iti atra uktam iti etat matvā abhyanujānāti

original: sa yadā sarvvaṃ tadakṛtvā sarvvānukramānubhāṣaṇena ślokapāṭhena sabhāsamvarṇṇanenānyena kālannayati tadāsau vyarthaṃ niṣprayojarna kālaṅgamayankarttavyasya  #

original: tasyāñca tathābhūtāyāṃ prastutāyāṃ sa svayameva kathāṃtaṃ kathā paryavasānaṃ pratipadyata iti nigrahasthānametat |

original: yadā punarvyājamātreṇaiva karoti tadā tasya pūrvvapakṣavādinaḥ svasādhanāsāmarthyaparicchedādeva vikṣepaḥ syāttataḥ kimityāha |

original: vādiorasamyak pravṛttau satyāṃ hetvābhāsāpratibhayoḥ saṃgraha iti sarvvo nyāyapravṛttaḥ pūrvvottarapakṣopanyāso dvayaṃ hetvābhāsāpratibhāñca  #

original: pūrvasādhananigrahasya sataḥ prativādinaḥ āpannaḥ prāpto nigraho yena tasyeti ceti vigrahaḥ |

original: na hyasti sambhavo yat paradoṣapratipādanārthamātmano doṣavatvamasāvabhyupeti |

ṇā iyam yathā pravṛttā iti pradarśana artham āha

yasya avasthitasya dharma antara nivṛttau dharma antaram pravarttate sā prakṛtiḥ avasthita rūpā

original: tathā nāsata āvirbhāvamutpādamantareṇa kasyaciddharmasya pravṛttirvā sidhyati |

grahaṇa viṣaya bhāvam āpādyate
na vidyamānasya kriyā asti upādānam iti upalabdhiḥ vā vidyamāna tvāt
na kāraka janya tvam iti evam pratyavasthitaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ sāṅkhyaḥ
kvacid saptamyā āpadyate

original: yadi sa kāpolaḥ sato dharmasyātmahānamasataścātmalābhamabhyupaiti tadānīmapasiddhānto bhavati |

original: evamapyekaprakṛtirvikārārāṇāmiti yoyaṃ pakṣaḥ pūrvvapratijñātaḥ sosya na sidhyati prakṛtivikāralakṣaṇasyānavasthitatvāt |

sthira bhāva vādinaḥ tu prati pratibandha vaikalyam sādhana vaiphalyam ca

original: anaṅgīkṛtasiddhānte tu nyāyavādini prativādini pūrvapakṣapratipādito doṣa iti |
analyzed: an aṅgīkṛta siddhānte tu nyāya vādini prativādini pūrvapakṣa pratipāditaḥ doṣaḥ iti
evam udāharaṇa antare api dūṣaṇam utprekṣya vaktavyam iti
yasmāt prakaraṇa cintā sa nirṇṇaya artham apadiṣṭaḥ prakaranasamaḥ
nyā sū

original: 7) vimarśādhiṣṭhānau pakṣapratipakṣāvanavasitau prakaraṇantasya cintāmavimarśāt prabhṛti prāṅnirṇṇayāt parīkṣaṇaṃ sā yatra kṛtā sa nirṇṇayārthaṃ  #
analyzed: vimarśa adhiṣṭhānau pakṣa pratipakṣau anavasitau cintām avimarśāt prabhṛti prāk nirṇṇayāt parīkṣaṇam sā yatra kṛtā sa nirṇṇaya artham

original: prayuktobhayapakṣasāmyāt prakaraṇamanativarttamānaḥ prakaraṇasamo na nirṇṇayāya kalpyate |
analyzed: prayukta ubhaya pakṣa sāmyāt prakaraṇam an ativarttamānaḥ prakaraṇasamaḥ na nirṇṇayāya kalpyate
kasmāt punar prakaraṇa cintā tattva apalabdheḥ

original: yasmādupalabdhe-tatverthe nivarttate cintā tasmātsāmānyenādhigatasya yā viśeṣato'nupalabdhiḥ sā prakaraṇacintāṃ prayojayatīti |
analyzed: yasmāt nivarttate cintā tasmāt sāmānyena adhigatasya yā viśeṣataḥ anupalabdhiḥ sā prakaraṇa cintām prayojayati iti
udāharaṇam anityaḥ śabdaḥ nitya dharma anupalabdheḥ
an upalabhyamāna nitya dharmakam anitya ndṛṣṭam sthālī ādi

original: yatra samāno dharmaḥ saṃśayakāraṇahetutvenopādīyate saṃśayasamaḥ savyabhicāra eva |
analyzed: yatra samānaḥ dharmaḥ saṃśaya kāraṇa hetu tvena upādīyate saṃśayasamaḥ savyabhicāraḥ eva

original: yā tu vimarśasya viśeṣāpekṣatobhayapakṣaviśeṣānupalabdhau sā prakaraṇampravartayati |
analyzed: yā tu vimarśasya viśeṣa apekṣatā ubhaya pakṣa viśeṣa anupalabdhau sā prakaraṇam pravartayati

original: yathā ca śabde nityadharmo nopalabhyate tathānityadharmopi |
analyzed: yathā ca śabde nitya dharmaḥ na upalabhyate tathā anitya dharmaḥ api
sā iyam ubhaya pakṣa viśeṣa anupalabdhiḥ prakaraṇa cintām prayojayati katham viparyaye prakaraṇa nivṛtteḥ
yadi nitya dharmaḥ śabde gṛhyeta na syāt prakaraṇam

original: yadi (na) nityadharmo gṛhyeta evamapi nivarttate prakaranaṃ |
analyzed: yadi na nitya dharmaḥ gṛhyeta evam api nivarttate prakaranam

original: soyaṃ hetu rubhau pakṣau pravarttayannānyatarasya nirṇṇayāya kalpyata iti |
analyzed: saḥ uyam hetu rubhau pakṣau pravarttayan na anyatarasya nirṇṇayāya kalpyate iti
na tu ayam sādhya a viśiṣṭaḥ eva
na a viśiṣṭaḥ
tasya eva prakaraṇa pravṛtti hetoḥ dharmasya hetu tvena upādānāt

original: yatra sādhyena samāno dharmo hetutvenopādīyate sa sādhyāviśiṣṭaḥ |
analyzed: yatra sādhyena samānaḥ dharmaḥ hetu tvena upādīyate sa sādhya aviśiṣṭaḥ

original: yatra punaḥ prakaraṇa pravṛttihetureva sa prakaraṇasama iti |
analyzed: yatra punar prakaraṇa pravṛtti hetuḥ eva sa prakaraṇasamaḥ iti
atra api nitya anitya dharma anupalambha dvayāt eva prakaraṇa cintā
na tu ekasmāt
viparyaye prakaraṇa nivṛttiḥ iti vacanāt
tat yadi nitya anidya dharma anupalabdheḥ iti hetuḥ syāt
syāt prakaraṇasamaḥ
tad eka dharma anupalabdheḥ tu upādāne katham prakaraṇasamaḥ iti abhidhānīyam
ubhaya dharma anupalambha upādāne api sapakṣa vipakṣayoḥ anuvṛtti vyāvṛtyoḥ aniścayāt asādharaṇa anaikāntikaḥ bhavati iti katham asya hetvābhāsaḥ
sa antara tvam
bhavatu nāma eka dharma anupalabdhiḥ eva hetuḥ prakaraṇasamaḥ

original: tathāpi nityaśabdavādyavaśyameva vyāmohānnityadharmān pratipadyata iti prativādyasiddhīyaṃ bhavati |
analyzed: tathā api nitya śabda vādī avaśyam eva vyāmohāt nitya dharmān pratipadyate iti prativādyasiddhīyam bhavati
atha pramāṇena nitya dharmma pratikṣepāt nitya dharma anupalabdhiḥ pratipādyate

original: tadāpi niścāyakatvāt samyajjñānaheturevāyaṃ iti kathaṃ hetvābhāsaḥ prakaraṇasamaḥ |
analyzed: tadā api niścāyaka tvāt samyak jñāna hetuḥ eva ayam iti katham hetvābhāsaḥ prakaraṇasamaḥ
tadā hi viśeṣa upalabdhiḥ eva hetvarthaḥ vyavatiṣṭhate
viśeṣāḥ ca nityasya kṛtaka tva ādayaḥ

original: na ca tatkṛtā prakaraṇacintā viparyaye prakaraṇanivṛtteriti vacanāt |
analyzed: na ca tad kṛtā prakaraṇa cintā viparyaye prakaraṇa nivṛtteḥ iti vacanāt

original: api ca nityadharmānupalabdheriti kimayaṃ prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ kimvā pratiyogividhānaṃ ( |
analyzed: api ca nitya dharma anupalabdheḥ iti kim ayam prasajya pratiṣedhaḥ kim vā pratiyogi vidhānam

original: ) yadi prasajyapratiṣedhastadā prameyatvādivat sādhāraṇānaikāntikoyaṃ nityadharmopalabdhiḥ pratiṣedhamātrasyānityatvarahiteṣvasatsvapi sambhavāt
analyzed: yadi prasajya pratiṣedhaḥ tadā prameya tva ādi vat sādhāraṇa anaikāntikaḥ yam nitya dharma upalabdhiḥ pratiṣedha mātrasya anitya tva rahiteṣu asatsu api sambhavāt
atha yuktyā hetu pratirūpa tva ayogaḥ
anyaḥ tu anyathā idam sūtra dvayam vyācaṣṭe
yaḥ hetuḥ hetu kāla ipad iṣṭā utyeti apaiti
kasmāt apaiti

original: pratyakṣeṇāgamena ubhayena vā pīḍyamānaḥ sa kālamatīta iti kālātīta ityucyate |
analyzed: pratyakṣeṇa āgamena ubhayena vā pīḍyamānaḥ sa kālam atītaḥ iti kāla atītaḥ iti ucyate

original: kutaḥ punaḥ pratyakṣāgamavirodho labhyata iti cet |
analyzed: kutas punar pratyakṣa āgama virodhaḥ labhyate iti ced
catur lakṣaṇaḥ hetuḥ iti vacanāt
tathā hi pūrvavat śeṣavat sāmānyatas
ñca iti atra catur rūpaḥ hetuḥ iṣṭaḥ
śeṣavat iti
sāmānyatas ca dṛṣṭam ca śabdāt aviruddham ca iti
tathā bhāṣya vacanam api asti
yat punar anumānam pratyakṣa āgama viruddham nyāya ābhāsaḥ saḥ iti

original: tadevaṃ trairūpye sati pratyakṣāgamābhyāṃ yo vādhyate sa kālātyayāpadiṣṭaḥ |
analyzed: tat evam trairūpye sati pratyakṣa āgamābhyām yaḥ vādhyate sa kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ

original: sa ca tridhā bhidyate pratyakṣaviruddha āgamaviruddha ubhayaviruddhaśceti ( |
analyzed: sa ca tridhā bhidyate pratyakṣa viruddhaḥ āgama viruddhaḥ ubhaya viruddhaḥ ca iti
pratyakṣa viruddhaḥ yathā anuṣṇa agniḥ dravya tvāt udaka vat

original: āgamaviruddho yathā brāhmaṇena surā pātavyā dravatvāt kṣiravat |
analyzed: āgama viruddhaḥ yathā brāhmaṇena surā pātavyā drava tvāt kṣira vat
ubhaya viruddhaḥ yathā raśmivat cakṣuḥ indriya tvāt ghrāṇa ādi vat iti

original: na cāyaṃ kila pakṣavirodhaḥ pakṣavirodhasya pratikṣepāditi |
analyzed: na ca ayam kila pakṣa virodhaḥ pakṣa virodhasya pratikṣepāt iti
tat etat trairupya lakṣaṇa anavavodha vaiśadyam

original: ) trairūpyaṃ hi yadā svaṃ pramāṇaiḥ pariniścitaṃ pakṣadharmatvādikaṃ trayaṃ ca yatra bādhyā tatra pratibandhosti |
analyzed: trairūpyam hi yadā svam pramāṇaiḥ pariniścitam pakṣa dharma tva ādikam trayam ca yatra bādhyā tatra pratibandhaḥ usti
bādhā vinābhāvayoḥ virodhāt

original: avinābhāvo hi satyeva sādhyadharme hetorbhāvaḥ kathañcāsau tallakṣaṇo dharmiṇi hetuḥ syānna cātra sādhyadharma ityādikamatrābādhitaviṣayatvadūṣaṇānusāreṇa  #
analyzed: avinābhāvaḥ hi sati eva sādhya dharme hetoḥ bhāvaḥ katham ca asau tad lakṣaṇaḥ dharmiṇi hetuḥ syāt na ca atra sādhya dharmaḥ iti ādikam atra abādhita viṣayatva dūṣaṇa anusāreṇa
vaktavyam

original: yatra punariyaṃ bādhodāhṛtā na teṣāṃ trailakṣaṇyaṃ manāgapyasti pratibandhavaikalyāt |
analyzed: yatra punar iyam bādhā udāhṛtā na teṣām trailakṣaṇyam manāk api asti pratibandha vaikalyāt
abhyupagata pakṣa prayogasya ca pakṣa doṣaḥ eva ayam yuktaḥ
yat punar bahu asaṃbaddham udgrāhitam tat atyantam asāram iti na iha avasīyate  /
yasmāt prakaraṇa cintā iti prakaranam bhāṣye nirūpitam
tasya udāharaṇam
aṇuḥ aṇu antara kārya tvam pratipadyate na vā iti cintāyām kaścid abhidhatte
aṇuḥ aṇu antara kāryaḥ rūpa ādima tvāt tat dvyaṇuka ādi vat iti

original: yosāvaṇoraṇuḥ kāraṇatvenopādīyate tatrāpi rūpādimatvamastīti cintā kimiyaṃ rūpādimatvādaṇvantarakāryo na veti cintāyāñca yadi tasyāpyṇvantarakāryatvaṃ  #
analyzed: yaḥ asau aṇoḥ aṇuḥ kāraṇa tvena upādīyate tatra api rūpa ādima tvam asti iti cintā kim iyam rūpa ādima tvāt aṇu antara kāryaḥ na vā iti cintāyām ca yadi tasya api ṇu antara kārya tvam

original: rūpādimatvāditi vakti tadā tasyāpi rūpādimatvamastīti punarapi cintā tadevamanavasthārūpaṃ prakaraṇaṃ pravarttayatīti prakaraṇasama ityucyate
analyzed: rūpa ādima tvāt iti vakti tadā tasya api rūpa ādima tvam asti iti punar api cintā tat evam anavasthā rūpam prakaraṇam pravarttayati iti prakaraṇasamaḥ iti ucyate

original: athāṇuraṇvantarakāryatvaṃ na pratipadyate rūpādimatve sati tadānaikāntiko heturiti tasmād bhidyate'naikāntikāt prakaraṇasamaḥ |
analyzed: atha aṇuḥ aṇu antara kārya tvam na pratipadyate rūpa ādima tve sati tadā anaikāntikaḥ hetuḥ iti tasmāt bhidyate naikāntikāt prakaraṇasamaḥ
na ca ayam viruddhaḥ viparyaya sādhaka tvāt
na asiddhaḥ pakṣa dharma tva darśanāt
na kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ pratyakṣa āgamābhyām a bādhyamāna tvāt
atas ṛtha antaram iti
athavā pradeśe karaṇam prakaraṇam ca iti kāraṇa siddhiḥ iti arthaḥ

original: pradeśe siddhiritīyaṃ cintā yasmāddhetorapadiṣṭā bhavati sa prakaraṇasamaḥ sa pradeśasādhakatvāt samaḥ |
analyzed: pradeśe siddhiḥ iti iyam cintā yasmāt hetoḥ apadiṣṭā bhavati sa prakaraṇasamaḥ sa pradeśa sādhaka tvāt samaḥ
yathā eka deśe sādhaka tvam tathā itaratra api iti asādhaka tva sāmānyāt samaḥ
tasmāt eka deśa varttī dharmaḥ prakaraṇasamaḥ
tat yathā pṛthivī ap tejaḥ vāyu ākāśāni anityāni sattāva tvāt iti
atrā api yadi akṣapāda mata anusārī tāvat evam pramāṇayati

original: paramāṇuḥ paramāṇvantarapūrvvako rūpādimatvād dvyaṇukādivaditi tadā tasyābhyupetavirodha iti nāyamatītakālād bhidyate |
analyzed: paramāṇuḥ paramāṇu antara pūrvvakaḥ rūpa ādima tvāt dvyaṇuka ādi vat iti tadā tasya abhyupeta virodhaḥ iti na ayam atīta kālāt bhidyate
atha bauddhaḥ karoti
tadā api hetoḥ asiddhiḥ paramāṇūnām rūpa ādi vyatirekeṇa anabhyupagamāt
ayogāt ca dvi adīnām ca abhāvāt ubhaya vikalaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: yadāpyanapekṣitasiddhānto nyāyavādī brūte tadāpi dvitīyapakṣoditadoṣānivṛttiriti nāyamasiddhādvyāvarttate |
analyzed: yadā api anapekṣita siddhāntaḥ nyāyavādī brūte tadā api dvitīya pakṣa udita doṣa anivṛttiḥ iti na ayam asiddhāt vyāvarttate

original: yo'panumeyaikadeśavarttī dharmaḥ pṛthivyādīnyanityānigandhavatvāditi ayamapyapasiddhāntāntarbhūta eveti na pṛthagvācyaḥ |
analyzed: yaḥ upanumeya eka deśa varttī dharmaḥ pṛthivī ādīni anityāni gandhava tvāt iti ayam api apasiddhānta antarbhūtaḥ eva iti na pṛthak vācyaḥ
na asiddhaḥ pakṣa eka deśa dharma tvāt
sapakṣa eka deśa vartti vat iti ced viṣamaḥ yam upanyāsaḥ

original: sapakṣa eva ca satvamityatra hi samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇameva na sakalasapakṣadharmatāṃ sādhanasya pratipādayati |
analyzed: sapakṣe eva ca satvam iti atra hi samuccīyamāna avadhāraṇam eva na sakala sapakṣa dharmatām sādhanasya pratipādayati

original: anumeye satvavacanaṃ punarayogavyavacchedena niyantṛbhūtamaśeṣasādhyadharmidharmatāyāḥ pratipādakamityanenaiva pakṣaikadeśāsiddhabhedānāmapohaḥ  #
analyzed: anumeye sattva vacanam punar ayoga vyavacchedena niyantṛ bhūtam aśeṣa sādhya dharmi dharmatāyāḥ pratipādakam iti anena eva pakṣa eka deśa asiddha bhedānām apohaḥ
kṛtaḥ iti apārthakam yatna antaram iti yat kiñcid etat
bhāvi viktaḥ api atrā eva khara rave patitaḥ
prakaraṇa samam anyathā samarthayati

original: yasmāddhetoḥ prakaraṇacintā vipakṣasyāpi vicāraḥ paścād bhavati sa evaṃ lakṣaṇo heturnirṇayāya yopadiśyamānaḥ prakaraṇasamo bhavati |
analyzed: yasmāt hetoḥ prakaraṇa cintā vipakṣasya api vicāraḥ paścāt bhavati saḥ evam lakṣaṇaḥ hetuḥ nirṇayāya yā upadiśyamānaḥ prakaraṇasamaḥ bhavati

original: prakaraṇe sādhye samastulyaḥ sattve'sattve vā yathā satsarvajñamitaratadviparītavinirmuktatvād rūpādivaditi |
analyzed: prakaraṇe sādhye samaḥ tulyaḥ sattve sattve vā yathā sat sarvajñam itara tad viparīta vinirmukta tvāt rūpa ādi vat iti

original: yasmādayaṃ heturubhayatra samāno yopyasatvaṃ sādhayati tasyāpi samānaḥ |
analyzed: yasmāt ayam hetuḥ ubhayatra samānaḥ yaḥ upya sattvam sādhayati tasya api samānaḥ
katham asat sarvajñatvam itara tad viparīta vinirmukta tvāt khara viṣāṇa vat iti
na ca ayam kila ubhaya dharma tve pi anaikāntikaḥ vipakṣa vṛttiḥ vaikalyāt
tat idam ācāryeṇa svayam pramāṇa viniścaye pratisiṣiddham
kam punar atra bhavān vipakṣam pratyeti sādhya abhāvam
katham idānīm hetum vipakṣa vṛttiḥ ubhaya dharmaiṇa eva ityādinā
artha grahaṇa vyākhyāne ca yat uktam tat atra api vaktavyam
viśeṣeṇa dūṣaṇam ca asya prapañcena uktam eva
evam prakaraṇa sama atīta kālayoḥ anupapattiḥ

original: sādhyavyabhicārasya tu yujyate hetvābhāsatvaṃ na tu yathā bhavatāmabhyupagamaḥ |
analyzed: sādhya vyabhicārasya tu yujyate hetvābhāsa tvam na tu yathā bhavatām abhyupagamaḥ
tathā hi bhavantaḥ sandigdha vipakṣa vyāvṛttikasya anaikāntika tvam na pratipadyante
adarśana mātreṇa eva vyatireka siddhi abhyupagamāt
atas eva ca bhavadbhiḥ apagata sa

original: śa]ṅkairevaṃ prayujyate prāpyakāriṇī cakṣuḥśrotre bāhyendriyatvāt ghrāṇādivat |
analyzed: śaṅkaiḥ evam prayujyate prāpya kāriṇī cakṣuḥ śrotre bāhya indriya tvāt ghrāṇa ādi vat
sa vikalpam pratyakṣam pramāṇa tvāt anumāna vat ityādi

original: na cādarśanamātreṇaiva vinā pratibandhena vyatirekesiddhiriti pratānitamanyatra |
analyzed: na ca adarśana mātreṇa eva vinā pratibandhena vyatireke siddhiḥ iti pratānitam anyatra
ātma mṛd cetanā ādīnām yaḥ bhāvasya a prasādhakaḥ

original: sa evānupalambhaḥ kiṃ hetvabhāvasya sādhaka ityādinā |
analyzed: saḥ eva anupalambhaḥ kim hetu abhāvasya sādhakaḥ ityādinā

original: tathā sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sandigdhaḥ sadasatvasyāpi samyagjñānahetutvameva yuṣmābhiriṣyate nānaikāntikatvaṃ yathā sātmakaṃ jīvaccharīramprāṇādimattvāditi
analyzed: tathā sapakṣa vipakṣayoḥ sandigdhaḥ sat asatvasya api samyak jñāna hetu tvam eva yuṣmābhiḥ iṣyate na anaikāntika tvam yathā sātmakam jīvat śarīram prāṇa ādimat tvāt iti

original: asya ca tadbhāvaḥ pratipāditaḥ pramāṇaviniścayā dau viruddhaprabhedastu bhāradvājavihitaḥ pratijñāvirodhaprastāva ieva nirākṛtaḥ |
analyzed: asya ca tad bhāvaḥ pratipāditaḥ pramāṇa viniścayāḥ viruddha prabhedaḥ tu bhāradvāja vihitaḥ pratijñā virodha prastāvaḥ nirākṛtaḥ

original: sādhyasamepi yoyamanyathāsiddho varṇyate yathā'nityāḥ paramāṇavaḥ kriyāvatvād ghaṭadivaditi ayamapi kila sādhyasamo yasmāt mūrtikriyārūpādimatvādaṇūnāṃ  #
analyzed: sādhyasame api yaḥ yam anyathā asiddhaḥ varṇyate yathā anityāḥ paramāṇavaḥ kriyāvat tvāt ghaṭa di vat iti ayam api kila sādhyasamaḥ yasmāt mūrti kriyā rūpa ādima tvāt aṇūnām
kriyāvat tvam na anitya tvāt iti
sa na upapadyate

original: dharmiṇi siddhatvānnahi dharmiṇi vidyamāna evāsiddho heturyujyate |
analyzed: dharmiṇi siddha tvāt na hi dharmiṇi vidyamānaḥ eva asiddhaḥ hetuḥ yujyate
sarve hetūnām asiddha tā prasaṅgāt
na etat evat nahi prakṣā īsti iti etāvatā pakṣa dharma tvam
sādhya vaśena hi dharmiṇaḥ pakṣa dharma tvam iṣyate
kevalasya sādhya tvāt

original: ) na ca sādhyo dharmo yadi dharmiṇi tena sādhanena vinā na sambhavati tasya ca sādhanasya sādhyadharmābhāve dharmiṇā sambhavastato hetoḥ pakṣadharmatvaṃ
analyzed: na ca sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ yadi dharmiṇi tena sādhanena vinā na sambhavati tasya ca sādhanasya sādhya dharma abhāve dharmiṇā sambhavaḥ tatas hetoḥ pakṣa dharma tvam

original: yadā punaranyathāpi sādhanāyopātte dharmiṇi dharma upapadyate tadā hetuttvamevañca viśiṣṭameva satvaṃ pakṣadharmatvena vivakṣitaṃ |
analyzed: yadā punar anyathā api sādhanāya upātte dharmiṇi dharmaḥ upapadyate tadā viśiṣṭam eva satvam pakṣa dharma tvena vivakṣitam
anyathā asiddha tvam yuktam eva sādhyasamam

original: tadidamatra pratividhānaṃ yadi khalu sādhyadharmābhāve dharmiṇi asambhavo hetorevaṃ vidhameva satvaṃ pakṣadharmatvena vivakṣitaṃ na tu bhāvamātraṃ  #
analyzed: tat idam atra pratividhānam yadi khalu sādhya dharma abhāve dharmiṇi asambhavaḥ hetoḥ evaṃvidham eva satvam pakṣa dharma tvena vivakṣitam na tu bhāva mātram

original: tadā kintaditthaṃbhūtaṃ pakṣadharmatvamavijñātamevānumeyaprakāśakamāhosvit pariniścitameveti prakāradvaye yadyavijñātaṃ prakāśakaṃ tadājñāpakahetunyāyamativarttate
analyzed: tadā kin tat itthaṃbhūtam pakṣa dharma tvam avijñātam eva anumeya prakāśakam āhosvit pariniścitam eva iti prakāra dvaye yadi avijñātam prakāśakam tadā ājñāpaka hetu nyāyam ativarttate

original: ) jñāpako hi hetuḥ svātmani jñānāpekṣo jñāpyamarthaṃ prakāśayati |
analyzed: jñāpakaḥ hi hetuḥ sva ātmani jñāna apekṣaḥ jñāpyam artham prakāśayati

original: sattā mātreṇa ca hetavo vipratipattinirākāraṇapaṭavaḥ santīti prativādināṃ parasparaparāhataṃ pravacananānātvaṃ na bhavet |
analyzed: sattā mātreṇa ca hetavaḥ vipratipatti nirākāraṇa paṭavaḥ santi iti prativādinām paraspara parāhatam pravacana nānātvam na bhavet

original: vijñātasyāpi gamakatve pramāṇādvā tasya pariniścayaḥ pramāṇādvā |
analyzed: vijñātasya api gamaka tve pramāṇāt vā tasya pariniścayaḥ pramāṇāt vā
na tāvat apramāṇasya bhūta artha niścaya hetu tva abhāvāt apramāṇāt gatiḥ anyathā prāmāṇyam evā avahīyate
yasmāt idam eva pramāṇasya pramāṇa tvam yat yathā avasthita vastu prakāśaka tvam

original: taccedamapramāṇasyāpyasti tadā kathaṃ tada pramāṇātsādhye dharmiṇi vinā sādhyadharmeṇāsadbhūṣṇorhetoḥ sattvampakṣadharmatvenādhigamyate tadāpi  #
analyzed: tat ca idam apramāṇasya api asti tadā katham pramāṇāt sādhye dharmiṇi vinā sādhya dharmeṇa asat bhūṣṇoḥ hetoḥ sattvam pakṣa dharma tvena adhigamyate tadā api

original: yata eva pramāṇāddhetoḥ siddhistata eva sādhyadharmasyāpītaṃ jāyata iti kimarthamayamakiñcitkaro heturūpādīyate |
analyzed: yatas eva pramāṇāt hetoḥ siddhiḥ tatas eva sādhya dharmasya apītam jāyate iti kimartham ayam akiñcitkaraḥ hetuḥ ūpādīyate

original: na ca hetoreva kevalasya tataḥ siddhiḥ sādhyadharmasya tu neti yuktamvaktuṃ hetorapi tato'siddhiprasaṅgāt tathā hyevamayaṃ htuḥ tatra dharmiṇi  #
analyzed: na ca hetoḥ eva kevalasya tatas siddhiḥ sādhya dharmasya tu nā iti yuktam vaktum hetoḥ api tatas siddhi prasaṅgāt tathā hi evam ayam htuḥ tatra dharmiṇi

original: sidhyati yadyanena sādhyadharmeṇa vineha nopapadyate sahaiva tūpapadyata iti sidhyet |
analyzed: sidhyati yadi anena sādhya dharmeṇa vinā iha na upapadyate saha eva tu upapadyate iti sidhyet

original: tathā ca kathantata eva pramāṇātsādhyadharmasyāpi na siddhiḥ sañjāteti cintanīyametat |
analyzed: tathā ca katham tatas eva pramāṇāt sādhya dharmasya api na siddhiḥ sañjātā iti cintanīyam etat
evam ca tena eva pramāṇena saha asya sādhya dharmasya
gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ na tu anena hetunā iti mahat aniṣṭam āpadyate

original: evamvidhapakṣadharmatvasamāśrayaṇe ca yāvat sādhyasyāsiddhistāvaddhetorapi yāvacca hetorasiddhistāvatsādhyasyāpīti parasparāśrayaprasaṅgaḥ
analyzed: evamvidha pakṣa dharma tva samāśrayaṇe ca yāvat sādhyasya asiddhiḥ tāvat hetoḥ api yāvat ca hetoḥ asiddhiḥ tāvat sādhyasya api iti paraspara āśraya prasaṅgaḥ

original: pakṣadharmatvaniścayavelāyāñca sādhyadharmasiddhiḥ sampadyata iti vyarthamuttaraliṅgarūpānusaraṇamitthañca na dvilakṣaṇaścaturlakṣaṇaḥ pañcalakṣaṇaśca  #
analyzed: pakṣa dharma tva niścaya velāyām ca sādhya dharma siddhiḥ sampadyate iti vyartham uttara liṅga rūpa anusaraṇam ittham ca na dvi lakṣaṇaḥ catur lakṣaṇaḥ pañca lakṣaṇaḥ ca
hetuḥ vaktavyaḥ

original: asmanmate tu dharmiṇi satvamātraṃ vijñāya ca taduttarakālamanvayavyatirekayorvijñānamanvayavyatirekau vā sarvvopasaṃhāreṇa vijñāyata uttarakāla  #
analyzed: asmad mate tu dharmiṇi satva mātram vijñāya ca tad uttara kālam anvaya vyatirekayoḥ vijñānam anvaya vyatirekau vā sarvva upasaṃhāreṇa vijñāyate uttara kāla

original: dharmiṇi satvamātraṃ vijñātamataścānantaryeṇaiva tatsāmarthyātsādhyadharmasya tatra pratītirupapadyate ( |
analyzed: dharmiṇi satva mātram vijñātam atas ca ānantaryeṇa eva tad sāmarthyāt sādhya dharmasya tatra pratītiḥ upapadyate

original: ) tenedamatra sakalaṃ doṣajālaṃ nabhasīvāmale jale nāvasthānamalaṃ labhata ityalamapratiṣṭhitamithyāpralāpairiti viramyate |
analyzed: tena idam atra sakalam doṣa jālam nabhasi iva amale jale na avasthānam alam labhate iti alam apratiṣṭhita mithyā pralāpaiḥ iti viramyate
yadi evam kim punar atra iṣṭam iṣṭam iti āha
hetvābhāsāḥ tu yathānyāyam ityādi ye nyāya hetvābhāsāḥ tad uktiḥ nigrahasthānam bhavati
te ca ye smābhiḥ uktāḥ
eka aprasiddhi saṃdehe prasiddha vyabhicāra bhāj
dvayoḥ viruddhaḥ śiddhau ca saṃdeha vyabhicāra bhāj iti

original: nanu cāyaṃ vācanyāyamārgaḥ sakalalokānibandhanabandhunā vādavidhānādāvārya vasubandhunā mahārājapathīkṛtaḥ ( |
analyzed: nanu ca ayam vāca nyāya mārgaḥ sakala loka a nibandhana bandhunā vāda vidhānāt āvārya vasubandhunā mahā rāja pathīkṛtaḥ
kṣuṇṇaḥ ca tadanu mahatyām nyāya parīkṣāyām kumati matamanta
matta mātaṅga śiraḥ pīṭha pāṭana paṭubhiḥ ācārya dignāga pādaiḥ tat kim idam punar carvita carvvaṇam āsthitam tvayā iti
etat codya parihāra param imam ślokam upanyasyati lokaḥ ityādi

original: timirañca paṭalañceti timirapaṭalaṃ avidyaiva timirapaṭalamavidyātimirapaṭalaṃ bhūtārthadarśanavibandhakatvāt |
analyzed: timiram ca paṭalam ca iti timira paṭalam avidyā eva timira paṭalam avidyā timira paṭalam bhūta artha darśana vibandhaka tvāt
tasya ullekhanaḥ vāda nyāyaḥ iti sambandhaḥ
ullekhana śabdaḥ kartṛ sādhanaḥ
kasya punar avidyā timira paṭalam iti āha
tattva dṛṣṭeḥ tattva darśanasya
prajñā locanasya iti arthaḥ
yaḥ eṣa samanantaram āveditaḥ vāda nyāyaḥ

original: sadbhiḥ pūrvācāryaiḥ parahitarataiḥ karuṇāpāratantryāllokān samyagvarttmani vyavasthāpayituṃ praṇītaḥ parāṃ prasiddhiṃ nīto loke suṣṭu sphuṭīkṛta  #
analyzed: sadbhiḥ pūrva ācāryaiḥ para hita rataiḥ karuṇā pāratantryāt lokān samyak varttmani vyavasthāpayitum praṇītaḥ parām prasiddhim nītaḥ loke suṣṭu sphuṭīkṛta
iti arthaḥ
na tu para sparddhayā nā api yaśaḥ kāma tā ādibhiḥ
ta dya iva antarhi tat avasthitam codyam iti atas āha
tatvasya ālokam udyotam vāda nyāyam ācāryaiḥ ūpadiṣṭam

original: kaḥ punarasāvatisāhasiko yo mahānāgeiḥ kṣuṇṇaṃ panthānaṃ roddhumīhata ityāha durvidagdhaḥ samyagvivekarahitatayā janoyamudyotakaraprīticandra
analyzed: kaḥ punar asau ati sāhasikaḥ yaḥ mahā nāgeiḥ kṣuṇṇam panthānam roddhum īhate iti āha durvidagdhaḥ samyak viveka rahita tayā
bhāvi vikta prabhṛtiḥ

original: yataśca evaṃ tasmādyatnaḥ kṛta iha vādanyāyaprakaraṇe mayā tasya mahadbhirudbhāvitasyāntarājatairavadhūtasya samujvālanāya |
analyzed: yatas ca evam tasmāt yatnaḥ kṛtaḥ iha vāda nyāya prakaraṇe mayā tasya mahadbhiḥ udbhāvitasya anta rājataiḥ avadhūtasya samujvālanāya

original: kudūṣaṇaparihāreṇa tannītyudyotanena mama vyāpṛtatvānna mayā piṣṭaṃ piṣṭamiti saṃkṣepārthaḥ ||
analyzed: kudūṣaṇa parihāreṇa tad nīti udyotanena mama vyāpṛta tvāt na mayā piṣṭam piṣṭam iti saṃkṣepa arthaḥ
anargha vanitā avagāhanam analpa dhī śaktinā api adṛṣṭa paramārtha sāram adhika abhiyogaiḥ api

ahan ca

original: mahārayenaiva na kiñcidatra tyaktamviviktaṃ na vibhajyameva |

original: tasmād yatnaḥ kṛta iha mayā tatsamujvālanāyeti || (49)

original: samvata ācū śrāvaṇakṛṣṇa ekādaśyāṃ likhitaṃ mayā |
